spells.name: Break Enchantment
spells.description: Frees subjects from enchantments, transmutations, and curses.

spells.name: Cure Critical Wounds
spells.description: Cures 4d8 damage + 1/level (max +20).

spells.name: Detect Scrying
spells.description: Alerts you to magical eavesdropping.

spells.name: Dimension Door
spells.description: Teleports you a short distance.

spells.name: Dominate Person
spells.description: Controls humanoid telepathically.

spells.name: Freedom of Movement
spells.description: Subject moves normally despite impediments to restrict movement.

spells.name: Hallucinatory Terrain
spells.description: Makes one type of terrain appear like another (field as forest, or the like).

spells.name: Hold Monster
spells.description: As hold person, but any creature.

spells.name: Invisibility, Greater
spells.description: As invisibility, but subject can attack and stay invisible.

spells.name: Legend Lore
spells.description: Lets you learn tales about a person, place, or thing.

spells.name: Locate Creature
spells.description: Indicates direction to known creature.

spells.name: Modify Memory
spells.description: Changes 5 minutes of subject's memories.

spells.name: Neutralize Poison
spells.description: Immunizes subject against poison, detoxifies venom in or on subject.

spells.name: Rainbow Pattern
spells.description: Lights fascinate 24 HD of creatures.

spells.name: Repel Vermin
spells.description: Insects, spiders, and other vermin stay 10 ft. away.

spells.name: Secure Shelter
spells.description: Creates sturdy cottage.

spells.name: Shadow Conjuration
spells.description: Mimics conjuration below 4th level, but only 20% real.

spells.name: Shout
spells.description: Deafens all within cone and deals 5d6 sonic damage.

spells.name: Speak with Plants
spells.description: You can talk to plants and plant creatures.

spells.name: Summon Monster IV
spells.description: Summons extraplanar creature to fight for you.

spells.name: Zone of Silence
spells.description: Keeps eavesdroppers from overhearing you.
